messages.body:
$SSNC Brooks Macdonald Partners with SS&C to Transform Wealth Business 

https://newsfilter.io/a/b18cedabd7eb0dced4ed59873a1346a1

links.title: Brooks Macdonald Partners with SS&C to Transform Wealth Business
links.description: WINDSOR, Conn., Oct. 27, 2020 /PRNewswire/ -- SS&C Technologies Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: SSNC) today announced that Brooks Macdonald, one of the U.K.'s leading wealth managers, has partnered with SS&C to transform its intermediary-focused business in the U.K. and the Channel Islands. The partnership encompasses technology and operational services to transform adviser experience and client service.

messages.body:
$SSNC SS&C Digitizes Benefits Administration
https://www.stocktitan.net/news/SSNC/ss-c-digitizes-benefits-kg9qjml7tb1b.html

links.title: SS&C Digitizes Benefits Administration | StockTitan.net
links.description: WINDSOR, Conn., Oct. 26, 2020 -- SS&C Technologies Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: SSNC) today announced the integration of its Benefits Real-time Information Exchange (BRIX) benefits administration platform with Vidado, its data digitization solution. The integration will enable insurers to seamlessly access and digitize paper or hard-to-read data on applications, streamlining adjudication and medical underwriting.

messages.body: $SSNC SS&C GlobeOp Forward Redemption Indicator: October notifications 2.84% https://www.otcdynamics.com/ssnc-ssc-globeop-forward-redemption-indicator-october-notifications-2-84

links.title: $SSNC SS&C GlobeOp Forward Redemption Indicator: October notifications 2.84%
links.description: "SS&C GlobeOp's Forward Redemption Indicator fell to 2.84% for October 2020, reflecting lower redemption notices than the 3.76% reported for the same period a year ago. The 2.84% reported for October 2020 also compares favorably to long-term averages for the month of October and marks the fourth consecutive month of lower year-over-year redemption notices," said Bill Stone, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, SS&C Technologies.

links.title: RiverNorth Opportunities Fund, Inc. Extends Rights Offering | StockTitan.net
links.description: DENVER, Oct. 20, 2020 -- RiverNorth Opportunities Fund, Inc. (NYSE: RIV) (the "Fund") announces that it has extended the expiration date ("Expiration Date") of the Fund's previously announced transferable subscription rights offering (the "Rights Offering") to 5:00 PM Eastern Time on November 6, 2020, unless further extended by the Fund's Board of Directors.

JPMorgan Chase Launches "Everyday 401(k)" Solution For Small Businesses With SS&C Technologies

Related Tickers: $JPM $SSNC

$SSNC $JPM JPMorgan Chase Launches Everyday 401(k) Solution for Small Businesses
https://www.stocktitan.net/news/SSNC/jp-morgan-chase-launches-everyday-401-k-solution-for-small-nfofer9ovge4.html

links.title: JPMorgan Chase Launches Everyday 401(k) Solution for Small | StockTitan.net
links.description: NEW YORK, Oct. 15, 2020 -- JPMorgan Chase today announced the launch of Everyday 401(k) by J.P. Morgan, giving the firm's thousands of small business clients and their employees the ability to simply plan, save and invest for retirement. Leading retirement solutions provider SS&C Technologies (Nasdaq: SSNC) will act as the underlying recordkeeper for Everyday 401(k).

links.title: Conference Call Transcripts
links.description: Get notified next time SSNC.US makes a similar move! Joseph J. Frank, SVP of SS&C Technologies Holdings, recently disposed of 189 shares of the company. The disposals took place at $64.09 per share, on October 12, 2020. Frank still owns 1,921 shares of the company. Frank operates out of Windsor, CT.

links.title: SS&C Strengthens Fixed Income Performance Measurement at Allianz | StockTitan.net
links.description: WINDSOR, Conn., Oct. 13, 2020 -- SS&C Technologies Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: SSNC) today announced that AllianzGI has chosen SS&C's Sylvan as its consolidated global performance measurement and attribution platform to support its fixed income businesses. AllianzGI's fixed income team manages EUR193 billion in assets globally.
